entity.name: Sarah Huckabee Sanders
entity.description: White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders

text: @CurtisHouck @PressSec @kayleighmcenany @newsbusters The COVID-19 is exploding and destroying our nation, killing our citizens, Russia is paying the Taliban cash to hunt and kill our precious soldiers. And you drone on about old meaningless statues. Shame, shame, shame on you for being an enabler to this horrific administration.
